\newcommand{\ottpremise}[1]{ #1 \\}
\newenvironment{ottdefnblock}[3][]{ \framebox{\mbox{#2}} \quad #3 \\[0pt]}{}
\newenvironment{ottfundefnblock}[3][]{ \framebox{\mbox{#2}} \quad #3 \\[0pt]\begin{displaymath}\begin{array}{l}}{\end{array}\end{displaymath}}
\newcommand{\ottfunclause}[2]{ #1 \equiv #2 \\}
\newcommand{\ottnt}[1]{\mathit{#1}}
\newcommand{\ottmv}[1]{\mathit{#1}}
\newcommand{\ottkw}[1]{\mathbf{#1}}
\newcommand{\ottsym}[1]{#1}
\newcommand{\ottcom}[1]{\text{#1}}
\newcommand{\ottdrulename}[1]{\textsc{#1}}
\newcommand{\ottcomplu}[5]{\overline{#1}^{\,#2\in #3 #4 #5}}
\newcommand{\ottcompu}[3]{\overline{#1}^{\,#2<#3}}
\newcommand{\ottcomp}[2]{\overline{#1}^{\,#2}}
\newcommand{\ottgrammartabular}[1]{\begin{supertabular}{llcllllll}#1\end{supertabular}}
\newcommand{\ottmetavartabular}[1]{\begin{supertabular}{ll}#1\end{supertabular}}
\newcommand{\ottrulehead}[3]{$#1$ & & $#2$ & & & \multicolumn{2}{l}{#3}}
\newcommand{\ottprodline}[6]{& & $#1$ & $#2$ & $#3 #4$ & $#5$ & $#6$}
\newcommand{\ottfirstprodline}[6]{\ottprodline{#1}{#2}{#3}{#4}{#5}{#6}}
\newcommand{\ottlongprodline}[2]{& & $#1$ & \multicolumn{4}{l}{$#2$}}
\newcommand{\ottfirstlongprodline}[2]{\ottlongprodline{#1}{#2}}
\newcommand{\ottbindspecprodline}[6]{\ottprodline{#1}{#2}{#3}{#4}{#5}{#6}}
\newcommand{\ottprodnewline}{\\}
\newcommand{\ottinterrule}{\\[5.0mm]}
\newcommand{\ottafterlastrule}{\\}
\usepackage{stmaryrd}

\newcommand{\ottmetavars}{
\ottmetavartabular{
 $ \ottmv{x} $ & \ottcom{term variable} \\
 $ \ottmv{f} $ & \ottcom{function declaration?} \\
 $ \ottmv{cnt} $ & \ottcom{program counter} \\
 $ \ottmv{n} $ & \ottcom{index variable} \\
 $ \ottmv{k} $ & \ottcom{index variable} \\
}}

\newcommand{\ottv}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{v}}{::=}{\ottcom{values}}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\ottkw{c}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{constant}}}

\newcommand{\otte}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{e}}{::=}{\ottcom{expressions}}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \oplus \, \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{binary operation}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottmv{x}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{variable}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottkw{c}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{constant}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottmv{f}  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{e_{\ottmv{n}}}  \ottsym{)}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{function application}}}

\newcommand{\otts}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{s}}{::=}{\ottcom{statements}}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\ottkw{skip}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{skip}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{;}  \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{sequence}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottkw{def} \, \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:=}  \ottnt{e}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{variable declaration}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:=}  \ottnt{e}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{variable assignment}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottkw{for} \, \ottmv{x} \, \ottkw{from} \, \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottkw{to} \, \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{2}}}} \, \in \, \ottnt{s}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{for loop}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottkw{return} \, \ottnt{e}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{return statement}}}

\newcommand{\ottfdef}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{fdef}}{::=}{\ottcom{function definitions}}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\ottnt{fdef} \, \ottmv{f}  \ottsym{(}  \ottmv{x_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x_{\ottmv{n}}}  \ottsym{)} \, \in \, \ottnt{s}}{}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottprogram}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{program}}{::=}{\ottcom{program}}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\ottnt{fdef_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{;} \, .. \, \ottsym{;}  \ottnt{fdef_{\ottmv{n}}}  \ottsym{;} \, \ottkw{expose} \, \ottnt{fdef}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{list of fdefs}}}

\newcommand{\ottfm}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{fm}}{::=}{\ottcom{function store}}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{ \emptyset }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{fm}  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{f}  \ottsym{=}  \ottnt{s}  \ottsym{;} \, \ottkw{return} \, \ottnt{e}}{}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottm}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{m}}{::=}{\ottcom{memory}}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{ \emptyset }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{m}  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{=}  \ottnt{v}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{m}  \ottsym{/}  \ottmv{x}}{}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottgrammar}{\ottgrammartabular{
\ottv\ottinterrule
\otte\ottinterrule
\otts\ottinterrule
\ottfdef\ottinterrule
\ottprogram\ottinterrule
\ottfm\ottinterrule
\ottm\ottafterlastrule

%% defn expr_reduce
\newcommand{\ottdruleExrXXbinopXXl}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{fm} \, \ottnt{m} \, \ottmv{cnt} \, \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \longrightarrow  \ottmv{cnt'} \, \ottnt{e'_{{\mathrm{1}}}}}%
}{
\ottnt{fm} \, \ottnt{m} \, \ottmv{cnt} \, \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \oplus \, \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \longrightarrow  \ottmv{cnt'} \, \ottnt{e'_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \oplus \, \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}{%
{\ottdrulename{Exr\_binop\_l}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleExrXXbinopXXr}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{fm} \, \ottnt{m} \, \ottmv{cnt} \, \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \longrightarrow  \ottmv{cnt'} \, \ottnt{e'_{{\mathrm{1}}}}}%
}{
\ottnt{fm} \, \ottnt{m} \, \ottmv{cnt} \, \ottnt{v} \, \oplus \, \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \longrightarrow  \ottmv{cnt'} \, \ottnt{v} \, \oplus \, \ottnt{e'_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}{%
{\ottdrulename{Exr\_binop\_r}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleExrXXbinopXXv}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{3}}}}  \equiv \llbracket  \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \oplus \rrbracket  \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{2}}}} }%
\ottpremise{ \ottmv{cnt'}  =  \ottmv{cnt}  + 1 }%
}{
\ottnt{fm} \, \ottnt{m} \, \ottmv{cnt} \, \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \oplus \, \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \longrightarrow  \ottmv{cnt'} \, \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{3}}}}}{%
{\ottdrulename{Exr\_binop\_v}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleExrXXvar}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{m}  \ottsym{=}  \ottnt{m'}  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{=}  \ottnt{v}}%
\ottpremise{ \ottmv{cnt'}  =  \ottmv{cnt}  + 1 }%
}{
\ottnt{fm} \, \ottnt{m} \, \ottmv{cnt} \, \ottmv{x}  \longrightarrow  \ottmv{cnt'} \, \ottnt{v}}{%
{\ottdrulename{Exr\_var}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleExrXXfnXXexpr}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{fm} \, \ottnt{m} \, \ottmv{cnt} \, \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \longrightarrow  \ottmv{cnt'} \, \ottnt{e'_{{\mathrm{1}}}}}%
}{
\ottnt{fm} \, \ottnt{m} \, \ottmv{cnt} \, \ottmv{f}  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{v_{\ottmv{k}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{e_{\ottmv{n}}}  \ottsym{)}  \longrightarrow  \ottmv{cnt'} \, \ottmv{f}  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{v_{\ottmv{k}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{e'_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{e_{\ottmv{n}}}  \ottsym{)}}{%
{\ottdrulename{Exr\_fn\_expr}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleExrXXfnXXcall}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{fm}  \ottsym{=}  \ottnt{fm'}  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{f}  \ottsym{=}  \ottnt{s}  \ottsym{;} \, \ottkw{return} \, \ottnt{e}}%
}{
\ottnt{fm} \, \ottnt{m} \, \ottmv{cnt} \, \ottmv{f}  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,} \, .. \, \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{v_{\ottmv{k}}}  \ottsym{)}  \longrightarrow  \ottmv{cnt'} \, \ottnt{e}}{%
{\ottdrulename{Exr\_fn\_call}}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdefnexprXXreduce}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{$\ottnt{fm} \, \ottnt{m} \, \ottmv{cnt} \, \ottnt{e}  \longrightarrow  \ottmv{cnt'} \, \ottnt{e'}$}{\ottcom{$\ottnt{e}$ reduces to $\ottnt{e'}$}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleExrXXbinopXXl{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleExrXXbinopXXr{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleExrXXbinopXXv{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleExrXXvar{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleExrXXfnXXexpr{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleExrXXfnXXcall{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}


\newcommand{\ottdefnsJop}{
\ottdefnexprXXreduce{}}

% defns Jpop
%% defn stmt_reduce
\newcommand{\ottdruleStrXXskip}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
\ottnt{fm} \, \ottnt{m} \, \ottmv{cnt} \, \ottkw{skip}  \ottsym{;}  \ottnt{s}  \longrightarrow  \ottnt{m} \, \ottmv{cnt} \, \ottnt{s}}{%
{\ottdrulename{Str\_skip}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleStrXXseq}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{fm} \, \ottnt{m} \, \ottmv{cnt} \, \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \longrightarrow  \ottnt{m'} \, \ottmv{cnt'} \, \ottnt{s'_{{\mathrm{1}}}}}%
}{
\ottnt{fm} \, \ottnt{m} \, \ottmv{cnt} \, \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{;}  \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \longrightarrow  \ottnt{m'} \, \ottmv{cnt'} \, \ottnt{s'_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{;}  \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}{%
{\ottdrulename{Str\_seq}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleStrXXdefXXexpr}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{fm} \, \ottnt{m} \, \ottmv{cnt} \, \ottnt{e}  \longrightarrow  \ottmv{cnt'} \, \ottnt{e'}}%
}{
\ottnt{fm} \, \ottnt{m} \, \ottmv{cnt} \, \ottkw{def} \, \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:=}  \ottnt{e}  \longrightarrow  \ottnt{m} \, \ottmv{cnt'} \, \ottkw{def} \, \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:=}  \ottnt{e'}}{%
{\ottdrulename{Str\_def\_expr}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleStrXXdefXXval}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \ottmv{cnt'}  =  \ottmv{cnt}  + 1 }%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{m'}  \ottsym{=}  \ottnt{m}  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{=}  \ottnt{v}}%
}{
\ottnt{fm} \, \ottnt{m} \, \ottmv{cnt} \, \ottkw{def} \, \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:=}  \ottnt{v}  \longrightarrow  \ottnt{m'} \, \ottmv{cnt'} \, \ottkw{skip}}{%
{\ottdrulename{Str\_def\_val}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleStrXXassignXXexpr}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{fm} \, \ottnt{m} \, \ottmv{cnt} \, \ottnt{e}  \longrightarrow  \ottmv{cnt'} \, \ottnt{e'}}%
}{
\ottnt{fm} \, \ottnt{m} \, \ottmv{cnt} \, \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:=}  \ottnt{e}  \longrightarrow  \ottnt{m} \, \ottmv{cnt'} \, \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:=}  \ottnt{e'}}{%
{\ottdrulename{Str\_assign\_expr}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleStrXXassignXXval}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \ottmv{cnt'}  =  \ottmv{cnt}  + 1 }%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{m'}  \ottsym{=}  \ottnt{m}  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{=}  \ottnt{v}}%
}{
\ottnt{fm} \, \ottnt{m} \, \ottmv{cnt} \, \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:=}  \ottnt{v}  \longrightarrow  \ottnt{m'} \, \ottmv{cnt'} \, \ottkw{skip}}{%
{\ottdrulename{Str\_assign\_val}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleStrXXfor}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{<}  \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}%
\ottpremise{ \ottnt{v'_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  =  \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  + 1 }%
\ottpremise{\ottmv{x} \, \notin \, \ottnt{m}}%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{m'}  \ottsym{=}  \ottnt{m}  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{=}  \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{1}}}}}%
}{
\ottnt{fm} \, \ottnt{m} \, \ottmv{cnt} \, \ottkw{for} \, \ottmv{x} \, \ottkw{from} \, \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{2}}}} \, \ottkw{to} \, \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{2}}}} \, \in \, \ottnt{s}  \longrightarrow  \ottnt{m'} \, \ottmv{cnt} \, \ottnt{s}  \ottsym{;}  \ottkw{for} \, \ottmv{x} \, \ottkw{from} \, \ottnt{v'_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottkw{to} \, \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{2}}}} \, \in \, \ottnt{s}}{%
{\ottdrulename{Str\_for}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleStrXXforXXbase}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{=}  \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{m'}  \ottsym{=}  \ottnt{m}  \ottsym{/}  \ottmv{x}}%
}{
\ottnt{fm} \, \ottnt{m} \, \ottmv{cnt} \, \ottkw{for} \, \ottmv{x} \, \ottkw{from} \, \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottkw{to} \, \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{2}}}} \, \in \, \ottnt{s}  \longrightarrow  \ottnt{m'} \, \ottmv{cnt} \, \ottkw{skip}}{%
{\ottdrulename{Str\_for\_base}}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdefnstmtXXreduce}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{$\ottnt{fm} \, \ottnt{m} \, \ottmv{cnt} \, \ottnt{s}  \longrightarrow  \ottnt{m'} \, \ottmv{cnt'} \, \ottnt{s'}$}{\ottcom{$\ottnt{s}$ reduces to $\ottnt{s'}$}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleStrXXskip{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleStrXXseq{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleStrXXdefXXexpr{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleStrXXdefXXval{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleStrXXassignXXexpr{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleStrXXassignXXval{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleStrXXfor{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleStrXXforXXbase{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}


\newcommand{\ottdefnsJpop}{
\ottdefnstmtXXreduce{}}

\newcommand{\ottdefnss}{
\ottdefnsJop
\ottdefnsJpop
}

\ottgrammar\\[5.0mm]
\ottdefnss}
